metadata.title: RA Family: What is included in the kit and any other components to prepare in addition?

sections.content:
Question:
What is included in the kit and any other components to prepare in addition?
Answer:
No, you do not need to prepare additional components. This kit is the complete package for you to start the evaluation. Please check our web landing page for detail.
AIK-RA6M3 https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/aik-ra6m3-ai-kit-reference-platform-ra6m3
AIK-RA4E1 https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/aik-ra4e1-ai-kit-reference-platform-ra4e1
Suitable Products
AIK-RA6M3
AIK-RA4E1
